Noun: table consisting of a horizontal surface over which business is transacted
game equipment (as a piece of wood, plastic, or ivor)
a calculator that keeps a record of the number of times something happens
a piece of furniture that stands at the side of a dining room; has shelves and drawers
a quick reply to a question or remark (especially a witty or critical on)
a piece of leather forming the back of a shoe or boot
a return punch (especially by a boxe)
Verb: act in advance of; deal with ahead of time
